screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .wastickers file in Apple Finder
screenshot.caption: WASTICKERS file open in Apple Finder

description: Sticker maker and Sticker Maker Studio allow WhatsApp users to create custom stickers and import those stickers into WhatsApp. After importing their sticker pack, users can add those stickers to WhatsApp messages.

The apps allow users to save and share sticker packs as WASTICKER files. WASTICKERS files are compressed with Zip-compression and typically contain at least three stickers. Each sticker is a 512 x 512 pixel WEBP image with a transparent background. Each sticker pack also includes a sticker tray icon, which is a 96 x 96 pixel PNG image.
